alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Greene (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 7:41PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL GREENE AND SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM EST... At 741 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waynesburg, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waynesburg, Masontown, Jefferson Boro, Fairdale, Isabella, Nemacolin, Republic, Carmichaels, and Rices Landing. This includes Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 7 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
